name: EdgeClash
description:
A fast-paced strategy game where your weapon dictate your options!

Enter the arena and fights waves of enemies using a plethora of randomly generated weapons each composed of distinct movement card, changing your strategy each game you play. The faster and harder it gets, the faster your score grows too!

Includes : 

- + 400 weapons divided in 3 classes.

- Cool little dudes with a nice and bouncy idle animation.

- They also die nicely.

- Like at least 3 musics.

- No blood. These dudes aren't that violent, they're cute!
